record.dc:title: 44OH13, 15OH13, Ohio County, Kentucky. Bowles Site. View of OH13.
record.wpa:narrative: View of Oh13 from the North showing its total length. The barn, intervening garden, house, out buildings and part of an orchard at right and part of pasture at left are all on the heap. Just beyond the heap to the South and to the West is the Green River which turns at the extreme right of the picture. Site located at juncture of Green and Mud Rivers, in corner of Ohio County.
